content: this pattern is available for free on my blog at the links above and below or you can purchase the ad free pdf here on ravelry the pixie shawlette is a light and lively free crochet shawl pattern on moogly that uses just one ball of red heart croquette - and is full of sparkle a simple 10-row repeat is the featured stitch pattern in the pixie shawlette - it shows off the yarn so beautifully i went with the neutral toned stonehenge colorway but red heart croquette comes in a bunch of gorgeous colors to choose from each of which will give a different look and with just one skein per shawlette you can try them all the pixie shawlette is a shawlette size as you can see in the schematic in the pattern i love this size for a light spring/summer accessory and the fingering weight yarn is perfect for this too - plus it kept it as a one skein pattern but if you prefer a bigger shawl that s no problem at all - just see the pattern notes and pick up an extra ball or two of red heart croquette right and left-handed video tutorials included
